item.title: Sony's Spider-Verse Future After Kraven Revealed As Studio Pivots Into "The Next Spider-Man Film" & More Popular Sub-Franchises
item.description: After many issues, Sony's Spider-Man Universe is reportedly on its last legs, with the franchise's future after Kraven the Hunter revealed.

item.title: Do The Golden Globes Matter Anymore? How The Nominations Shape The Oscars
item.description: The Golden Globes still matter, and the nominations for the 2025 ceremony will likely influence the nominations for the 97th Academy Awards.

item.title: Julie & Julia Movie Taught Amy Adams One Real-Life Cooking Skill: "It Was A Great Gift"
item.description: The 2009 cooking movie Julie & Julia taught Amy Adams herself a key cooking skill, she reveals as she recounts how the movie depicts food.
